{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Vault of Qingce|It|The Vault of Qingce}} is a cavern located behind a waterfall north of [[Qingce Village]]. It is rumored to hold the remains of the [[Chi]]. It contains a floating orb-like mechanism that glows with a golden light.</p>}}

There is a secret room at the back that can be accessed during the {{Quest|The Chi of Yore}}, which contains various treasures and some buildings in the style of Qingce Village.
